com.rift.coad.daemon.timer
Class TimerEvent

java.lang.Object
  com.rift.coad.daemon.timer.TimerEvent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class TimerEvent
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This object stores the values of an event from the database.

TimerEvent

public TimerEvent()

TimerEvent

public TimerEvent(int id,
                  java.lang.String jndi,
                  java.io.Serializable event,
                  int month,
                  int day,
                  int hour,
                  int minute,
                  boolean recure)
The contructor responsible for setting the private member variables.

Parameters:
id - The id of the timer.
jndi - The jndi url for the event.
event - The serializable event identifier.
month - The month the event occurs in.
day - The day of the month that the event occurs on.
hour - The hour the event occurs on.
minute - The minute the event occurs on.
recure - If true the event will recure and is not just a once off.
